articles.content:
With the Covid-19 vaccination drive completing three days in Delhi, officials involved in the immunisation programme flagged another problem on Tuesday - that of wastage of doses.

articles.title: This Is The Biggest Mistake You Can Make After Getting Your COVID Vaccine - msnNOW
